body:
- [x] Adds two hashes for Gromacs and Plumed
- [x] Adds Plumed 2.7.2 to Gromacs version constraints 

# Tests

- `spack spec gromacs@2020.6+plumed` pulls Plumed 2.7.2
- `spack spec gromacs@2021+plumed` pulls Plumed 2.7.2
- `spack spec gromacs@2020.5+plumed` pulls Plumed 2.7.1
- `spack install gromacs@2020.6~mpi+plumed` installs successfully
- `spack load gromacs@2020.6~mpi+plumed` `gmx` runs successfully
title: Add Gromacs 2020.6 and Plumed 2.7.2
